technicalRepresentation.source:
<zofar:questionSingleChoice uid="sc" xmlns:zofar="http://www.his.de/zofar/xml/questionnaire" xmlns:display="http://www.dzhw.eu/zofar/xml/display" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
    <zofar:header>
        <zofar:question uid="q">Ist Ihr gegenwärtiger
						Arbeitsvertrag…</zofar:question>
    </zofar:header>
    <zofar:responseDomain itemClasses="true" uid="rd" variable="v1_13_befristet">
        <zofar:answerOption label="unbefristet?" uid="ao1" value="1"/>
        <zofar:answerOption label="befristet?" uid="ao2" value="2"/>
        <zofar:answerOption label="Sonstiges" uid="ao3" value="88">
            <zofar:questionOpen size="30" uid="qo" variable="v1_13a">
                <zofar:prefix>
                    <zofar:label uid="l">und zwar:</zofar:label>
                </zofar:prefix>
            </zofar:questionOpen>
        </zofar:answerOption>
    </zofar:responseDomain>
</zofar:questionSingleChoice>

additionalQuestionText.en: Is your current employment contract...,Permanent?,Temporary?,Other,Please give details:
